@description.name: @description
@description.body: This utility class implements some methods for the VirtualTree.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns if the passed item is a node or a leaf.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: childProperty {String} The property name to find the children.
@param.description: The property name to find the children.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} True when the passed item is a node, false when it is a leaf.
@return.description: True when the passed item is a node, false when it is a leaf.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the node has visible children or not.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: childProperty {String} The property name to find the children.
@param.description: The property name to find the children.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: ignoreLeafs {Boolean?} Indicates whether leafs are ignored. This means when it is set to true a node which contains only leafs has no children. The default value is false.
@param.description: Indicates whether leafs are ignored. This means when it is set to true a node which contains only leafs has no children. The default value is false.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} True when the node has visible children, false otherwise.
@return.description: True when the node has visible children, false otherwise.
